Redis Labs | Software Engineer | Full-time | REMOTE |

The RedisGraph team at Redis Labs is looking to hire a full-time remote engineer.

RedisGraph is a graph database architecture implemented in C that uses sparse matrices to express graph problems as linear algebra expressions.

We're a small international team of people that are passionate about writing well-optimized, low-level code and enjoy solving problems with mathematical reasoning.

Our project can be found at:

https://github.com/RedisLabsModules/RedisGraph

https://oss.redislabs.com/redisgraph/

The major qualifications for this position are:

- Experience in C

- Knowledge of linear algebra

- Familiarity with graph databases

- Comfortable working remotely

To apply or get further information from us, please email jeffrey at redislabs.com
